source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, causing an Upheveal at 100% effectiveness that does not knock enemies up. Casting Breath of Eons always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Your Upheavals have a 50% chance to grant Essence Burst. Eruptions cast with Essence Burst deal 25% increased damage.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Opulent Treasurescale's Gleaming Mantle

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 85 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,569 to 10,473 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 317 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 963 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 963 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

item.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the cause of Darnassus.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
